root.name: Artificial Girl 2
root.description: Artificial Girl 2 is the second installment of the Hentai game franchise, "Artificial Girl."ControlsS - Change camera angleD - Call and embrace girlF - Call girl and take her handLocationsThere are several different areas in this game:BeachDungeonComputer LabSchoolHot SpringsTrain StationPondStreetsCliffYour HouseIn each location the girl with interact with you differently.PC System Requirements98SE/2000/XP/ME 1.0 GHz Processor128 MB RAM (256 MB recommended)8x CD-ROM32 MB DirectX 8-compatible video cardDirectSound-compatible soundcard256 MB of RAMDVD-ROM32 MB video card
